wikipedia_page.main: William Tang was a video game author in the 1980s, best known for his ZX Spectrum and Commodore 64 series starring Horace.

response: The Horace video game series was created in the 1980s by William Tang for Beam Software. The series comprised Hungry Horace, Horace Goes Skiing and Horace and the Spiders.
* William Tang wrote the Horace series of games (Hungry Horace, Horace Goes Skiing and Horace and the Spiders) for Beam Software, published by Sinclair Research and Melbourne House.
*William Tang (fashion designer) (born 1959), Hong Kong fashion designer
*William Tang (video game designer), Hong Kong video game designer of the video game Horace
*William Tang, former guitarist of the Hong Kong rock band Beyond
